General.Name: Hollywood Bowl Group plc
General.Description: Hollywood Bowl Group plc operates ten-pin bowling and mini-golf centers in the United Kingdom. The company also supplies and installs bowling equipment. As of December 16, 2022, it operated 75 centers under the Hollywood Bowl, Puttstars, and Splitsville brands. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Hemel Hempstead, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Focus 31, Hemel Hempstead, United Kingdom, HP2 7BW
